casebody.data:
Kazue Stamm v. Metro North Commuter Railroad et al. (10679)

Norcott, Foti and Landau, Js.

Argued June 5 decision released June 30, 1992 John M. Ciuffo, with whom, on the brief, was Russell J. Berkowitz, for the appellant (plaintiff). *903Kenneth B. Povodator, assistant corporation counsel, with whom, on the brief, was Daniel M. McCabe, corporation counsel, for the appellee (defendant city of Stamford). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
